description: Join our Telegram community for instant updates, game tips, and connect with fellow players. Our moderators are available to help with any questions.
Follow us on Instagram for behind-the-scenes content, game highlights, and exclusive promotions. Tag us in your gameplay moments!
Subscribe to our YouTube channel for tutorials, gameplay videos, tournament highlights, and announcements from the MPL team.
Join our Discord server to chat with other players, find teammates, participate in community events, and get real-time support.
Follow us on Twitter for the latest news, updates, and announcements. Join the conversation using #MPLCommunity.
Like our Facebook page for community events, tournaments, and exclusive content. Share your achievements with our community!
